dsOverview.title: Earth Insolation for 1.1 Million Years (from Belgium)

summary.p: This dataset contains monthly-average insolation values in 10-degree latitude bands for the past one million years and mid-month insolation values in the same latitude bands for one million years BP (Before Present) to 100,000 years AP (After Present).

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section,Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Radiation > Incoming Solar Radiation
